name: Gravitational Time Dilation Calculator
description: Calculate time dilation effects near massive objects using Einstein's theory of general relativity. Input mass, radius, and observer time to compute gravitational time dilation.

howTo.name: How to use the Gravitational Time Dilation Calculator
howTo.description: Step-by-step instructions for calculating gravitational time dilation effects

step.text: Enter the time passed in seconds in the first input field
step.name: Enter observer time

step.text: Enter the mass of the object in solar masses in the second input field
step.name: Enter mass

step.text: Enter the radius (distance from the object) in kilometers in the third input field
step.name: Enter radius

step.text: Click the Calculate button to compute the gravitational time dilation effect
step.name: Calculate
